```{r}
library(rgdal) 

# ... or use example data
dataset = read.table(text = "
    ID X Y
    1 118 10
    2 119 50
    3 100 12
    4 101 12", 
    header=T, sep=" ")

# create a matrix from columns X & Y and use project as in the question
project(as.matrix(dataset[, c("X","Y")]), "+proj=utm +zone=51 ellps=WGS84")
#             [,1]    [,2]
# [1,]   -48636.65 1109577
# [2,]   213372.05 5546301
# ...
```
